name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer with a proven track record of leveraging **3D modeling** and engineering software, including **Fusion**, **Solidworks**, and **AutoCAD**, to create high-quality designs and components. Possessing expertise in **metalworking**, **forming**, and **machining** processes, ensuring precision and functionality in engineering projects.
Skilled in utilizing MS Word and Excel for documenting and analyzing project metrics, enhancing communication with stakeholders. Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in diverse teams while implementing advanced technical solutions.
With over 13 years of experience in the tech field as a Full Stack Developer, I have a strong foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by frontend and backend proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have successfully delivered AI/ML-powered platforms focusing on predictive analytics and automation, while also deploying cloud-native systems using **AWS** and **Azure**. My commitment to compliance-driven development aligns with rigorous industry standards, reinforcing my ability to contribute effectively to complex engineering challenges.
